prompts: Create a majestic Pokemon with powerful wings and a noble demeanor.
I want a legendary creature that embodies strength and honor in battle.
Generate an elegant blue Pokemon with a flowing tail and a fierce gaze.
Make a mythical warrior Pokemon that stands tall and commands respect.
Imagine a fierce guardian Pokemon with a shimmering sword and a regal presence.
Design a powerful bipedal Pokemon with armor-like features and a striking color palette.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that represents valor and bravery in its appearance.
